claimEngagementReward(address,uint256,by.details: Manually claim engagement reward if registration was done before rewards integration

params._validUntilBlock: Block number until signature is valid

params._cUSDAddress: Address of cUSD token on Celo
params._engagementRewards: Address of GoodDollar Engagement Rewards contract (can be zero)

contribute(uint256).details: Make a contribution to the pool

executeWithdrawal(uint256).details: Execute a withdrawal request after voting period

getWithdrawalLimits(address).details: Get withdrawal limits for a worker

getWorkerInfo(address).details: Get worker information including referral stats

hasVoted(uint256,address).details: Check if an address has voted on a request

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

registerWorker(string,string,uint8,uint2.details: Register as a new worker in the pool with optional engagement rewards

params._inviter: Address of the person who invited this worker (address(0) if none)
params._signature: User signature for engagement rewards (empty if not claiming)
params._validUntilBlock: Block number until signature is valid (0 if not claiming reward)
params._yearsExperience: Years of experience in gig work

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestWithdrawal(uint256,string).details: Request an emergency withdrawal with tiered verification

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifyWorker(address).details: Verify a worker's identity (called by owner/oracle after Self Protocol verification)

params._worker: Address of the worker to verify

params._support: True to approve, false to reject
